trans-unit.source: Demonstration – Set Up and Process Customer Rebates

seg-source.mrk: Demonstration – Set Up and Process Customer Rebates

trans-unit.source: This demonstration provides an overview of how to use the system for customer rebates. It shows how to combine customers to purchasing associations and how to create scale commission rates and commission statements.

seg-source.mrk: This demonstration provides an overview of how to use the system for customer rebates.
It shows how to combine customers to purchasing associations and how to create scale commission rates and commission statements.

trans-unit.source: Scenario: Three customers – The Cannon Group PLC, Selangorian Ltd., and Deerfield Graphics Company – decide to incorporate into a purchasing association headed by The Cannon Group. They enter into an agreement with Kevin, the sales manager at CRONUS, that if their total sales per month exceed defined values, they will receive a credit memo. Kevin instructs Phyllis, the accounting manager, to create a new commission recipient record used as rebate recipient for the purchasing association, enter the negotiated rebate rates, and combine the customers into a rebate group.

seg-source.mrk: Scenario: Three customers – The Cannon Group PLC, Selangorian Ltd., and Deerfield Graphics Company – decide to incorporate into a purchasing association headed by The Cannon Group.
They enter into an agreement with Kevin, the sales manager at CRONUS, that if their total sales per month exceed defined values, they will receive a credit memo.

Kevin instructs Phyllis, the accounting manager, to create a new commission recipient record used as rebate recipient for the purchasing association, enter the negotiated rebate rates, and combine the customers into a rebate group.

trans-unit.source: Susan, the sales order processor, enters new sales orders for customers of the purchasing association.

seg-source.mrk: Susan, the sales order processor, enters new sales orders for customers of the purchasing association.

trans-unit.source: At the end of the month, Arnie, the accounts receivable administrator, creates the commission statement used as a rebate statement and issues the commission statement for the purchasing association.

seg-source.mrk: At the end of the month, Arnie, the accounts receivable administrator, creates the commission statement used as a rebate statement and issues the commission statement for the purchasing association.

trans-unit.source: Create a Commission Recipient

seg-source.mrk: Create a Commission Recipient

trans-unit.source: Phyllis creates a new commission recipient record for the purchasing association headed by The Cannon Group as instructed. The new commission recipient should be a member of the commission group REBATE.

seg-source.mrk: Phyllis creates a new commission recipient record for the purchasing association headed by The Cannon Group as instructed.
The new commission recipient should be a member of the commission group REBATE.

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to create the commission recipient:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to create the commission recipient:

trans-unit.source: On the cc|commission menu, click Commission Recipients.

seg-source.mrk: On the cc|commission menu, click Commission Recipients.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click New and then press ENTER to insert a new record. Number C-0006 is assigned automatically from the number series.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click New and then press ENTER to insert a new record.
Number C-0006 is assigned automatically from the number series.

trans-unit.source: In the Name field, type The Cannon Group PLC.

seg-source.mrk: In the Name field, type The Cannon Group PLC.

trans-unit.source: In the Address field, type 192 Market Square.

seg-source.mrk: In the Address field, type 192 Market Square.

trans-unit.source: In the Post Code field, enter B27 4KT.

seg-source.mrk: In the Post Code field, enter B27 4KT.

trans-unit.source: On the Invoicing FastTab, enter REBATE in the Commission Group Code field.

seg-source.mrk: On the Invoicing FastTab, enter REBATE in the Commission Group Code field.

trans-unit.source: : Commission Recipient Card for The Cannon Group PLC

seg-source.mrk: : Commission Recipient Card for The Cannon Group PLC

trans-unit.source: Do not close the Commission Recipient Card page.

seg-source.mrk: Do not close the Commission Recipient Card page.

trans-unit.source: Assign Customers to Purchasing Association

seg-source.mrk: Assign Customers to Purchasing Association

trans-unit.source: Phyllis assigns the customers of the purchasing association by assigning the new commission recipient which is used as rebate recipient.

seg-source.mrk: Phyllis assigns the customers of the purchasing association by assigning the new commission recipient which is used as rebate recipient.

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to assign the customers to the commission recipient:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to assign the customers to the commission recipient:

trans-unit.source: On the Commission Recipient Card page, click Navigate > Customers.

seg-source.mrk: On the Commission Recipient Card page, click Navigate > Customers.

trans-unit.source: In the Customer No. field, enter 10000.

seg-source.mrk: In the Customer No.
field, enter 10000.

trans-unit.source: In the Share % field, type 100.

seg-source.mrk: In the Share % field, type 100.

trans-unit.source: On the next line, enter 20000 in the Customer No. field and 100 in the Share % field.

seg-source.mrk: On the next line, enter 20000 in the Customer No.
field and 100 in the Share % field.

trans-unit.source: On the next line, enter 40000 in the Customer No. field and 100 in the Share % field.

seg-source.mrk: On the next line, enter 40000 in the Customer No.
field and 100 in the Share % field.

trans-unit.source: : Customers assigned to Commission Recipient C-0006

seg-source.mrk: : Customers assigned to Commission Recipient C-0006

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the Comm. Recipient Customer Catalog page.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Comm.
Recipient Customer Catalog page.

trans-unit.source: Specify Scale Commission Rates

seg-source.mrk: Specify Scale Commission Rates

trans-unit.source: Phyllis enters the scale commission rates negotiated for the purchasing association.

seg-source.mrk: Phyllis enters the scale commission rates negotiated for the purchasing association.

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to enter scale commission rates for the commission recipient:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to enter scale commission rates for the commission recipient:

trans-unit.source: On the Commission Recipients Card for C-0006, click Commission Rates on the Navigate tab.

seg-source.mrk: On the Commission Recipients Card for C-0006, click Commission Rates on the Navigate tab.

trans-unit.source:
In the header, set the following filters:
  • Sales Type Filter = All Customers
  • Comm. Recipient Type Filter = Commission Recipient
  • Comm. Recipient Code Filter = C-0006
  • Type Filter = All Items

seg-source.mrk: In the header, set the following filters:
• Sales Type Filter = All Customers
<li class="ccTextvorlageNumberedList">Comm.
Recipient Type Filter = Commission Recipient
<li class="ccTextvorlageNumberedList">Comm.
Recipient Code Filter = C-0006
• Type Filter = All Items

trans-unit.source:
On the first line, enter the following information:
  • Minimum Amount = 5000
  • Commission Type = Percent
  • Commission = 1

seg-source.mrk: On the first line, enter the following information:
• Minimum Amount = 5000
• Commission Type = Percent
• Commission = 1

trans-unit.source:
On the second line, enter the following information:
  • Minimum Amount = 7500
  • Commission Type = Percent
  • Commission = 1.25

seg-source.mrk: On the second line, enter the following information:
• Minimum Amount = 7500
• Commission Type = Percent
• Commission = 1.25

trans-unit.source:
On the third line, enter the following information:
  • Minimum Amount = 10000
  • Commission Type = Percent
  • Commission = 1.5

seg-source.mrk: On the third line, enter the following information:
• Minimum Amount = 10000
• Commission Type = Percent
• Commission = 1.5

trans-unit.source: : Commission Rates assigned to commission recipient The Cannon Group PLC

seg-source.mrk: : Commission Rates assigned to commission recipient The Cannon Group PLC

trans-unit.source: Close the Commissions Rates and Commission Recipient Card pages.

seg-source.mrk: Close the Commissions Rates and Commission Recipient Card pages.

trans-unit.source: Create Posted Sales Document Lines for Items

seg-source.mrk: Create Posted Sales Document Lines for Items

trans-unit.source: Susan, the sales order processor, enters new sales orders for customers of the purchasing association. The orders can be delivered directly. Susan can post the shipment and the invoice.

seg-source.mrk: Susan, the sales order processor, enters new sales orders for customers of the purchasing association.
The orders can be delivered directly.
Susan can post the shipment and the invoice.

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to enter and post sales orders:

seg-source.mrk: On the Sales & Marketing menu, click Order Processing > Sales Orders.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click New and then press ENTER.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click New and then press ENTER.

field, enter 10000.

trans-unit.source: In the Posting Date field, enter 03/07/19.

field, enter 1900-S.

trans-unit.source: Create Manual Commission Statements

seg-source.mrk: Create Manual Commission Statements

trans-unit.source: At the end of the month, Arnie, the accounts receivable administrator, creates the monthly commission statements for the purchasing association.

seg-source.mrk: At the end of the month, Arnie, the accounts receivable administrator, creates the monthly commission statements for the purchasing association.

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to create a manual commission statement:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to create a manual commission statement:

trans-unit.source: On the cc|commission menu, click Commission Statements.

seg-source.mrk: On the cc|commission menu, click Commission Statements.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click New and then press ENTER to automatically populate the No. field.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click New and then press ENTER to automatically populate the No.
field.

trans-unit.source: In the Commission Recipient No. field, enter C-0006.

seg-source.mrk: In the Commission Recipient No.
field, enter C-0006.

trans-unit.source: In the Posting Date field, enter 03/31/19.

seg-source.mrk: In the Posting Date field, enter 03/31/19.

trans-unit.source: In the Document Date field, enter 03/31/19.

seg-source.mrk: In the Document Date field, enter 03/31/19.

trans-unit.source: In the Statement from field, enter 03/01/19.

seg-source.mrk: In the Statement from field, enter 03/01/19.

trans-unit.source: In the Statement to field, enter 03/31/19.

seg-source.mrk: In the Statement to field, enter 03/31/19.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Suggest Commission Statement Lines.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Suggest Commission Statement Lines.

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the message that three lines were created.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the message that three lines were created.

trans-unit.source: : Commission Statement for The Cannon Group PLC

seg-source.mrk: : Commission Statement for The Cannon Group PLC

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Statistics to review the total commissionable amount for this commission statement.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Statistics to review the total commissionable amount for this commission statement.

trans-unit.source: : Commission Statistics to review total commissionable amount for The Cannon Group PLC

seg-source.mrk: : Commission Statistics to review total commissionable amount for The Cannon Group PLC

trans-unit.source: Because the total commissionable amount is greater than 7,500 but lower then 10,000, the 1.25% commission rate is used for this commission statement.

seg-source.mrk: Because the total commissionable amount is greater than 7,500 but lower then 10,000, the 1.25% commission rate is used for this commission statement.

trans-unit.source: Close the Comm. Statement Statistics page.

seg-source.mrk: Close the <span class="Bold">Comm.
Statement Statistics page.

trans-unit.source: Issue Commission Statement

seg-source.mrk: Issue Commission Statement

trans-unit.source: After Arnie checks the commission statements, he issues and prints the commission statement for the purchasing association to use it as the basis for the credit memo.

seg-source.mrk: After Arnie checks the commission statements, he issues and prints the commission statement for the purchasing association to use it as the basis for the credit memo.

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to issue and print an issued commission statement:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to issue and print an issued commission statement:

trans-unit.source: On the Commission Statement, click Issue on the ribbon.

seg-source.mrk: On the Commission Statement, click Issue on the ribbon.

trans-unit.source: Click OK to run the Issue Commission Statement batch job.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to run the Issue Commission Statement batch job.

trans-unit.source: On the cc|commission menu, click Issued Commission Statements.

seg-source.mrk: On the cc|commission menu, click Issued Commission Statements.

trans-unit.source: Select the line for the Issued Commission Statement created for The Cannon Group PLC.

seg-source.mrk: Select the line for the Issued Commission Statement created for The Cannon Group PLC.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Print.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Print.

trans-unit.source: Click Print to generate a printed document, or click Preview to review the commission statement on the screen.

seg-source.mrk: Click Print to generate a printed document, or click Preview to review the commission statement on the screen.

trans-unit.source: : Commission Statement with rebates for The Cannon Group PLC

seg-source.mrk: : Commission Statement with rebates for The Cannon Group PLC
